page.title: 07FARMING AROUND ROYSTON
page.content: Tracey Green's father works on a farm. The owner of the farm is Sir Gerald Newman. The manager is Mr.Smith. Tracey's father and uncle work together, they work on{tractors.}Her father works very hard.Tracey sometimes goes and helps her sister Angela to plant{potatoes.}When they are grown,the potatoes are put on the{trailer.} Every year Tracey's father and uncle go to{ploughing matches.}The best one gets the cup,but if they do not win the cup they get a certificate Tracey's father has won first,second and third prizes.They have ploughing matches in October and November each year.In the big shed at the farm there are lots of these prizes.Tracey visits the farm every Sunday.
